channel.title: Ayurveda on Steven Deobald
channel.description: Recent content in Ayurveda on Steven Deobald

item.title: Why Ayurveda? Because Science!
item.description: He squinted through a pair of wrap-around sunglasses, the kind one often expects to see on the crowning end of a wheelchair with wings of lenses spread wide and soaring across a sea of wrinkles – or drool, if the sea had previously suffered a stroke. Or at home in makeshift bingo halls constructed of a dusty old Lions Club because all the Lions and Lionesses were dead and even the Rotary Club (Rotors?
